attributes.additional_details: This petition is to bring justice not only to the soldier lee rigby who got violantly murdered but to his family friends and regiment.This kind of crime can not go on, and justice needs to be served also this is why we need to bring back corporal punishment. Because of those two murderers, lee rigbys two year old son has to grow up without a dad. Our soldiers should be able to walk round there own counrty wearing what they want with pride!! It makes me sick to think our goverment are not doing a thing about it! LETS GETS DO IT OURSELVES AND GET JUSTICE
